评论概述: If it had pockets I'd own one in every color!
评论详情: First up, measurements: 165#, 5'6", bust 41.5", waist 34", hips 40". I bought the ivory white XL (14-16), and it's a true white. Slightly cool white, but only when put against cream do you feel it's blue-ish. Seems really just spot-on white. This dress is LONG and stretchy and sooo comfortable. I love that the sleeves actually go to my wrist, the hem kisses the floor when I'm in flats, and the neckline is modest without making me feel choked. Since it's so stretchy it doesn't really need the side-zipper, but I suppose that's good to have in case I gain weight and can't slide it on with the ease I currently can. Just needs pockets to be perfect.
The dress ran at the true size. I went a size up but it ran too big.

I read all the comments and was hopeful, but found out differently. To me it ran a bit small and short. The sleeves were at least an inch and a half too short and the length of the dress was doable, but would have liked it a bit longer. It also ran small. I sized up and would have still like it to still be a bit looser. I’m a slim 5’11”. Beautiful dress, just didn’t fit like I was hoping. Story of my tall life.

Loved everything about this dress! Perfect for grandson’s late afternoon/evening/outdoor/vineyard wedding. Great quality fabric, beautiful color, soft, comfortable & perfect fit. Is definitely floor length…average height lady will require heels.
The dress fits perfectly and is elegant looking. The color is a bit lighter than the photo but still. Beautiful. I highly recommend. It will fit perfect of you pay attention to the measurements .
Not true to size

This dress was well made but it is a bit too long for my liking . If I wear heels I would prefer to have the dress not dragging the floor . That’s my only complaint other than that I would have kept it

The material was thin, but somehow not elastic. There wasn't much wiggle room in the chest and arm area and the cuffs cut RIGHT below my wrists, which was disappointing. The color was beautiful and the sinching at the waist is flattering, but I wouldn't have bought it if I had known about the quality.

The color is much more vibrant than the picture. This is my second time purchasing this dress, my first was in blue. I would size down if you want it more fitted. I’m usually 1x-2x but I got the XL here. I recommend wearing a slip dress underneath as the fabric is very thin and can easily show your bra and underwear outline. The fabric itself is opaque though. It is a very long and sweeping skirt so be prepared to not need to wear cute shoes with it lol

I am 5"11 and this is so long. I have a 35" Inseam to give you an idea. The dress hits the top of my feet. It's perfect! It is a thick stretchy fabric but is still to sheer. So I bought a thick dress slip to wear under it and it's perfect.  The swoopy design on front is flattering. I bought a size bigger then normal because I wants a relaxed fit. Fits just the way i wanted it to fit.
The length is great - the sleeves need to be open more of a ballon nature then straight - it would be more comfortable with wider or open sleeves

I got this as a Latter-day Saint temple dress. Great price for such a nice dress! The material is good quality and hangs nicely. It has kind of a stretchy, smooth, nylon-y feel, which is relatively heavy. I haven't worn it around much, but I anticipate the fabric will be at least somewhat wrinkle resistant. Comfortable.  The fit is perfect. For reference, I'm about 5'8 and 120 lbs, and I got a SMALL (I'm not sure why Amazon is saying I got an X-large--that's not correct). So happy to find a dress that's actually long enough!  I didn't notice the side zipper at first, which made it unnecessarily difficult to get on. But with the zipper, it's very easy. No more difficult back zippers from my previous temple dresses!  Keep in mind that this dress is not lined. The material is decently thick, so it's certainly not transparent, but you'll still probably need a slip underneath to mask underwear lines. The only real downside to this dress is NO POCKETS. so keep that in mind if you're using this as a temple dress like me (thankfully, I have a pocket in my slip).
I love how this dress is modest and elegant at the same time. I did have to hem it up at the bottom a bit, but it fits beautifully.

This dress was perfect for my occasion - truly royal blue in color. The material is more on the heavier side; so you won’t need a coat or jacket. The quality is great too! I’m tall so the dress fit perfectly for my stature. You will be surprised as well happy with this dress.

This dress is beautiful.  The fabric is flowing and looks quite elegant.  I usually wear an XLG and I purchased an XLG for this dress.  I am 5'6" and 150.  The dress  fits comfortably and it does not cling to the body anywhere.  The fabric is not thin so it looks flaterring....no bulges show in this dress  Just be sure you purchase the size that works for you.  Excellent buy on Amazon.

I plan to contact seller shortly and will update review with resolution details. I ordered my normal size of medium but arms and band below breast are a little snug. I would suggest sizing up so I plan to re-order a large. The fabric is somewhat stretchy.

I was initially worried about ordering a dress on Amazon, but I am very pleased. I was going to an event and needed a semi fancy dress for this event. This was perfect. It was a durable polyester dress. The fabric was thicker than most and the dress was exactly as described. It was warm which was great because our event was at a barn in February, so I was comfortable. I am 5’8” and 135 lbs so a medium fit perfectly. I wore tennis shoes under the dress (for dancing) and didn’t have any issues with it being too long. It washes well and a warm iron gets the wrinkles out. I received many compliments.

This is an elegant style just waiting for accessories. It is well-made; no loose threads or puckered seams. It is a stretchy nylon jersey. The circumference of the skirt is seven feet! I know this because I hemmed it by hand, a labor of love. Add jewelry, scarves, shawls, and twirl and twirl that 7 feet. You will love this dress.
